name: Army Survival Training: Army C
description:
Army Survival Training: Army Courses is essential for any military group to keep them in shape and be prepared for any emergency situation at any time for your country. You are a guerrilla soldier preparing to offer your military services to beloved country but need to pass certain tests for your fitness check.
features :
- Realistic Training Environment.
- Exciting Obstacles.
- Fun Gameplay.
- Challenging levels.
- Swimming, climbing, crouching.
- Smooth and intuitive controls.
- Stunning High Quality Graphics.
